Probability Travel.name: Probability Travel
Probability Travel.flavor: You see all the possibilities and choose one, and the minds of your enemies reel from the sudden changes.
Probability Travel.attack:
Your highest ability modifier + 4 vs. Will
Level 21: Your highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Will
Probability Travel.onHit: 3d10 + your highest ability modifier psychic damage, and you teleport the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier.
Probability Travel.effect: Each ally in the area can teleport a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Excoriating Strands.name: Excoriating Strands
Excoriating Strands.flavor: Tapping into your knowledge of balance, and tapping into insecurities, you unleash coruscating arcs of brilliant energy that strip  your foes of their most reliable defenses.
Excoriating Strands.attack: Your highest ability modifier + 6 vs. Fortitude
Excoriating Strands.onHit: 3d10 + your highest ability modifier psychic damage, and the target loses all resistances and immunities (save ends). This damage ignores resist psychic and insubstantial.
Excoriating Strands.aftereffect: The target loses all resistances and immunities (save ends).
Excoriating Strands.onMiss: Half damage, and the target loses all resistances and immunities (save ends). This damage ignores resist psychic and insubstantial.

Wind of Reprisal.name: Wind of Reprisal
Wind of Reprisal.flavor: Riding a psychic connection created from your enemyâ€™s wrath, you teleport closer to your attacker and send a projectile intended for you at another target.
Wind of Reprisal.trigger: An enemy misses you with a ranged attack
Wind of Reprisal.effect: The attacking creature rerolls the attack against a creature of your choice within 5 squares of you. You then teleport up to 5 squares plus a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier, as long as you arrive in a square within 5 squares of the triggering enemy.
